ModMetaData.name: [ATW] Ridiculous Chicken Variety
ModMetaData.author: MG_Atwood
ModMetaData.description:
Ever felt your colonists need more chicken colours in their lives? Now they can have a ridiculous number! This mod adds over 70 chicken coat variations so even Hen 43 can feel special.
This mod shouldn't affect chicken variants added by other mods, only the vanilla chickens. Load after Vanilla Textures Expanded or any other texture-altering mods that affect vanilla chickens.
